response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,500,000, but considering its significance to you, we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer encapsulates not only the quality and craftsmanship of the product but also reflects our commitment to finding the right owner who appreciates its true worth. We look forward to discussing how this product could enhance your life and business. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 1350000}
